projects.name: Backbase
projects.description: Leading the development of AI-powered features in the company's main product using Angular. Implementing complex UI components and integrating AI services while maintaining high performance and accessibility standards.

projects.name: Statrys
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive fintech platform using both Angular and React. Led the migration of legacy components to modern Angular architecture while building new features in React. Implemented complex financial workflows and real-time currency conversion interfaces.

projects.name: PW
projects.description: Built a sophisticated Document Management System for aerospace using Angular 14. Implemented complex document workflows, version control, and interactive diagram features using GoJS. Focused on performance optimization and seamless user experience.

projects.name: Topicus - Web Application
projects.description: Working for a Web application for managing entities relating to the Wealth management domain (order, invoice, payment, …). The solution helps the bankers or wealth managers attract new customers and reduce the amount of work that can be handled automatically by the system.

projects.name: Finantix
projects.description: Spearheaded the migration from AngularJS to Angular 7 for a comprehensive financial management platform. Developed responsive interfaces for order management, invoicing, and payment processing. Implemented wealth management demonstration tools for client presentations.

projects.name: Trabble
projects.description: Developed a tourism chatbot platform using both Angular 5 and React, showcasing versatility in modern frontend frameworks. Integrated multiple APIs (Facebook, Google Places) and implemented real-time communication features using SignalR.

projects.name: Dairy NZ
projects.description: Project to build an app for using on Android and IOS devices to score the cows and allow other to score them also.

projects.name: Analytics Platform
projects.description: Project for building table like Excel that allow to edit inline to manage data.
